title: Reacting to our followers DIRTIEST secrets... yall are wild
description:
This week on Fool Coverage, Manny and Laura AND Tyler do round 2 of your dirtiest secrets exposed where they expose and commentate on your sent in secrets and then go head to head in some Disney trivia!

Follow Laura on IG: @larlarlee
Follow Manny on IG: @mannymua733
More about the show: 
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or using this link: https://bit.ly/FoolCoverage
Check out Fool Coverage on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKlJLwZV472zWlO9eQv4RGg

Thanks to our sponsor: 
For listeners of the show, give your hair exactly what it's been craving with Vegamour! Go to vegamour.com/fool and use code FOOL to save 20% on your first order!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
